pr_title: HDDS-2950. Upgrade jetty to the latest 9.4 release

timeline.message: HDDS-2950. Upgrade jetty to the latest 9.4 release
Import proper 3.2 version from HttpServer2 and dependencies + fix all the checkstyle / findbug errors

timeline.bodyText: This can be changed to private as well?
timeline.author: smengcl

timeline.bodyText: hadoop.http.sni.host.check.enabled is added in HADOOP-16718 in trunk. We might want it here as well?
timeline.author: smengcl

timeline.bodyText: I see .clone() is added here. For safe practice?
timeline.author: smengcl

replies.bodyText: Yes, it was a findbugs violation (internal representation is leaked...)
replies.author: elek
